00025 // This is called by the brower when the 2D context has been flushed to the
00026 // browser window.
00027 void FlushCallback(NPP instance, NPDeviceContext* context,
00028                    NPError err, void* user_data) {
00029 }

00031 namespace bridge {
00032 
00033 PiGenerator::PiGenerator(NPP npp)
00034     : ScriptingBridge(npp),
00035       window_(NULL),
00036       scriptable_object_(NULL),
00037       device2d_(NULL),
00038       quit_(false),
00039       thread_(0),
00040       pi_(0.0) {  
00041   InitializeIdentifiers();
00042 }
00043 
00044 PiGenerator::~PiGenerator() {
00045   quit_ = true;
00046   if (thread_) {
00047     pthread_join(thread_, NULL);
00048   }
00049   if (scriptable_object_) {
00050     NPN_ReleaseObject(scriptable_object_);
00051   }
00052   DestroyContext();
00053 }
00054 
00055 NPObject* PiGenerator::GetScriptableObject() {
00056   if (scriptable_object_ == NULL) {
00057     scriptable_object_ =
00058       NPN_CreateObject(npp_, &ScriptingBridge::np_class);
00059   }
00060   if (scriptable_object_) {
00061     NPN_RetainObject(scriptable_object_);
00062   }
00063   return scriptable_object_;
00064 }
00065 
00066 NPError PiGenerator::SetWindow(NPWindow* window) {
00067   if (!window)
00068     return NPERR_NO_ERROR;
00069   if (!IsContextValid())
00070     CreateContext();
00071   if (!IsContextValid())
00072     return NPERR_GENERIC_ERROR;
00073   // Clear the 2D drawing context.
00074   pthread_create(&thread_, NULL, pi, this);
00075   window_ = window;
00076   return Paint() ? NPERR_NO_ERROR : NPERR_GENERIC_ERROR;
00077 }
00078 
00079 bool PiGenerator::Paint() {
00080   if (IsContextValid()) {
00081     NPDeviceFlushContextCallbackPtr callback =
00082         reinterpret_cast<NPDeviceFlushContextCallbackPtr>(&FlushCallback);
00083     device2d_->flushContext(npp_, &context2d_, callback, NULL);
00084     return true;
00085   }
00086   return false;
00087 }
00088 
00089 bool ScriptingBridge::Paint( const NPVariant* args,
00090                              uint32_t arg_count,
00091                              NPVariant* result) {
00092   PiGenerator* pi_generator = static_cast<PiGenerator*>(npp_->pdata);
00093   if (pi_generator) {
00094     DOUBLE_TO_NPVARIANT(pi_generator->pi(), *result);
00095     return pi_generator->Paint();
00096   }
00097   return false;
00098 }

00101 
00102 void PiGenerator::CreateContext() {
00103   if (IsContextValid())
00104     return;
00105   device2d_ = NPN_AcquireDevice(npp_, NPPepper2DDevice);
00106   assert(IsContextValid());
00107   memset(&context2d_, 0, sizeof(context2d_));
00108   NPDeviceContext2DConfig config;
00109   NPError init_err = device2d_->initializeContext(npp_, &config, &context2d_);
00110   assert(NPERR_NO_ERROR == init_err);
00111 }
00112 
00113 void PiGenerator::DestroyContext() {
00114   if (!IsContextValid())
00115     return;
00116   device2d_->destroyContext(npp_, &context2d_);
00117 }
00118 
00119 // pi() estimates Pi using Monte Carlo method and it is executed by a separate
00120 // thread created in SetWindow(). pi() puts kMaxPointCount points inside the
00121 // square whose length of each side is 1.0, and calculates the ratio of the
00122 // number of points put inside the inscribed quadrant divided by the total
00123 // number of random points to get Pi/4.
00124 void* PiGenerator::pi(void* param) {
00125   const int kMaxPointCount = 1000000000;  // The total number of points to put.
00126   const uint32_t kOpaqueColorMask = 0xff000000;  // Opaque pixels.
00127   const uint32_t kRedMask = 0xff0000;
00128   const uint32_t kBlueMask = 0xff;
00129   const unsigned kRedShift = 16;
00130   const unsigned kBlueShift = 0;
00131   int count = 0;  // The number of points put inside the inscribed quadrant.
00132   unsigned int seed = 1;
00133   PiGenerator* pi_generator = static_cast<PiGenerator*>(param);
00134   uint32_t* pixel_bits = static_cast<uint32_t*>(pi_generator->pixels());
00135   srand(seed);
00136   for (int i = 1; i <= kMaxPointCount && !pi_generator->quit(); ++i) {
00137     double x = static_cast<double>(rand_r(&seed)) / RAND_MAX;
00138     double y = static_cast<double>(rand_r(&seed)) / RAND_MAX;
00139     double distance = sqrt(x * x + y * y);
00140     int px = x * pi_generator->width();
00141     int py = (1.0 - y) * pi_generator->height();
00142     uint32_t color = pixel_bits[pi_generator->width() * py + px];
00143     if (distance < 1.0) {
00144       // Set color to blue.
00145       ++count;
00146       pi_generator->pi_ = 4.0 * count / i;
00147       color += 4 << kBlueShift;
00148       color &= kBlueMask;
00149     } else {
00150       // Set color to red.
00151       color += 4 << kRedShift;
00152       color &= kRedMask;
00153     }
00154     pixel_bits[pi_generator->width() * py + px] = color | kOpaqueColorMask;
00155   }
00156   return 0;
00157 }
00158
